author: abhi18av
body:
Hi guys,

I've been working on the [`conda-forge`](https://conda-forge.org/) package for `PowerShellCore` in this [PR](https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/4033) 

I'm running into issues, could you help me get `powershell` into the conda management space ?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Could you please explain what help you need?

title: conda-forge package for PowerShellCore
